ThingDef.label: retinal retro-reflector implant
ThingDef.description: An implant that enhances low light vision but reduces bright light vision.

ThingDef.label: extracted tapetum lucidum
ThingDef.description: An extracted tapetum lucidum - the organ responsible for night vision in many mammals. With some work this could be fashioned into an implant suitable for humanoids.
